entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 09 January 2023
